title: Virgin Galactic finally flies its first commercial space tourism mission
description: The flight, commissioned by the government of Italy, comes nearly 20 years after Richard Branson started the company.

title: Investors charged with insider trading in Trump Media merger deal
description: One of the investors allegedly learned of the plan for Digital World Acquisition to merge with Trump Media when he was appointed to DWA's board before the deal was publicly announced.

title: Supreme Court’s ruling on online harassment outrages victims, advocates
description: The court's 7-2 ruling found that while true threats of violence aren’t protected by the First Amendment, other harassing online speech is,

title: Meta Oversight Board calls for Cambodian leader’s accounts to be suspended
description: Cambodia's Hun Sen, who faces an election next month, posted a video on Facebook in which he threatened to beat up opponents and send gangsters to their homes.

title: Rooftops, cafes and Zoom rooms: Libraries evolve to serve remote workers
description: Libraries have become a popular co-working space in the hybrid era.

title: Hot phone? Here’s how to cool it down (say no to the fridge)
description: As record-breaking heat waves bake areas of the United States and Europe, here is the Help Desk's tips to keep our hot phones cool.
